snippet.textDisplay:
Spoiler...



guys but ... is this game a sequel?! .. there are a lot of details that make you think. Sephiroth manifests itself over and over again in Cloud, however it seems to be aware of many things. a detail that I can take now is present practically at the beginning of the game with arerith !! he touch her shoulder and then turns to Cloud later saying "you can't save anyone etc" (as if he were alluding to arerith's death already occurred) another detail present at the beginning of the game is the composition.
"the promised Land". well .. this composition is present in AC. not in the original game ... instead in this "" remake "" it is present ..
unfortunately I have not yet played .. but I have seen some spoilers that are making me think this, or that Sephiroth is somehow managing to reset everything. I'm probably saying nonsense. in this case.. Sorry. What do you think?!
snippet.textOriginal:
Spoiler...



guys but ... is this game a sequel?! .. there are a lot of details that make you think. Sephiroth manifests itself over and over again in Cloud, however it seems to be aware of many things. a detail that I can take now is present practically at the beginning of the game with arerith !! he touch her shoulder and then turns to Cloud later saying "you can't save anyone etc" (as if he were alluding to arerith's death already occurred) another detail present at the beginning of the game is the composition. 
"the promised Land". well .. this composition is present in AC. not in the original game ... instead in this "" remake "" it is present ..
unfortunately I have not yet played .. but I have seen some spoilers that are making me think this, or that Sephiroth is somehow managing to reset everything. I'm probably saying nonsense. in this case.. Sorry. What do you think?!

snippet.textDisplay: Not going to give anything away but it's gameplay is not epic. It is worth the buy but it must improve on many thing's in it's gameplay. Rating: story and combat 10/10, general movement 7/10, amount of fight encounters 5/10, the amount you can use summons 1/10, Summons entrance 5/10, when summond using them is 10/10, graphics 8/10, materia usage 10/10, weapons 10/10, music 10/10. So a total 7.6/10. If they fix the 4 problems in the game this game would be epic. I can't say why but when you play you will see.
snippet.textOriginal: Not going to give anything away but it's gameplay is not epic. It is worth the buy but it must improve on many thing's in it's gameplay. Rating: story and combat 10/10, general movement 7/10, amount of fight encounters 5/10, the amount you can use summons 1/10, Summons entrance 5/10, when summond using them is 10/10, graphics 8/10, materia usage 10/10, weapons 10/10, music 10/10. So a total 7.6/10. If they fix the 4 problems in the game this game would be epic. I can't say why but when you play you will see.
